sentences.en: At the time, she was about ten (= ten years old ) .
sentences.cn: 那时她10岁左右。

sentences.en: Finally, after ten hours of negotiations, the gunman gave himself up.
sentences.cn: 经过10个小时的谈判，持枪歹徒终于投降了。

sentences.en: He could have looked over the papers in less than ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 他本可在10分钟内把文件翻看一遍的。

sentences.en: His mother looked ten years younger in jeans and flats.
sentences.cn: 他妈妈穿上牛仔裤和平跟鞋，看上去年轻了10岁。

sentences.en: I need to be home by ten (= ten o’clock ) .
sentences.cn: 我得在10点之前回家。

sentences.en: Presidential elections are due to be held in ten days' time.
sentences.cn: 总统竞选将在10天后如期举行。

sentences.en: She embroidered on this theme for about ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 她围绕这个主题添枝加叶地说了大约10分钟。

sentences.en: Snow had been falling steadily for ten days.
sentences.cn: 雪已经连续下了10天了。

sentences.en: Speaking outside Ten Downing Street, she declared that she would fight on.
sentences.cn: 她在英国首相官邸外发表讲话时宣称她将继续斗争下去。

sentences.en: St Andrews was ten miles in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 圣安德鲁斯在相反方向上10英里处。

sentences.en: Teenage conceptions have risen steadily in the last ten years.
sentences.cn: 过去10年中，少女怀孕的现象不断增多。

sentences.en: ten to one you'll never find out who did this.
sentences.cn: 你很可能永远都找不出这是谁做的。

sentences.en: The new planet is about ten times the size of the earth.
sentences.cn: 新发现的行星大约是地球的10倍那么大。

sentences.en: The patient rates the therapies on a scale of zero to ten.
sentences.cn: 患者按十分制给这些治疗方法打分。

sentences.en: They clocked off duty and left at ten to three.
sentences.cn: 他们打卡下班，于2点50分离开。

sentences.en: They sat talking and necking in the car for another ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 他们在车里又坐了10分钟，边说边搂着亲热。

sentences.en: They used to buy ten kilos of beef in one lump.
sentences.cn: 他们过去常买10公斤重的整块牛肉。

sentences.en: Though ten years old, this book is highly recommended.
sentences.cn: 尽管是10年前出版的，这本书仍值得大力推荐。

sentences.en: you have to give her ten out of ten for persistence.
sentences.cn: 你得赞扬她的坚持不懈。

sentences.en: You'll get through at least ten nappies a day.
sentences.cn: 你每天至少得用10块尿布。

phrases.tran_cn: 唐宁街十号（英国首相官邸，在Downing Street第10号）
（由于对方工作出色而给予的）赞扬；祝贺

trans.tran_cn: 十个人，十点钟，十岁，十元纸币
